1. Speaking the Matter An oral history workbook co-published by Los Angeles Contemporary Archive and East of Borneo

2. Inverse Surveillance Project A multi-media art installation by Assia Boundaoui

3. Worthy Wine Works Los Angeles Contemporary ArchiveLos Angeles Contemporary Archive's natural wine fundraiser. Visit

4. Movie Nights at Divison Place Movie series screening independently made films from and adjacent to Southeast Asia Visit

5. Protocols Online journal featuring provocative art and writing from across the global Jewish diaspora Visit

6. Community Reading Group Critical Reading and Study Gathering Visit

7. Because We've Read Radical Int'l Bookclub. Visit

Joy / Jade designs and codes for organizers, collectives, artists, publications, and projects invested in abolition, critical inquiry, art, and something more sustainable.

She lives and climbs in Los Angeles.

Reach me @ info@joy-jade.com

Endnotes: This site was designed and built from scratch in 2019 by yours truly. Updated in 2022 | The typefaces? Plain-old Arial Narrow. And Miller Italic | Most of the photography credit belongs to others, with the exception of a few art direction projects (Daily Harvest + Brilliant) | BWR was built by Adlai | Original Protocols website was built by Adam Berman | Otherwise I designed and developed projects 00-04!
